content:
/>
X.iv.1.A.2.b
.
Discharge or Dismissal by Sentence of a GCM
A statutory bar to benefits exists when the facts indicate a former service member was discharged or dismissed from service by the sentence of a GCM.
All dishonorable discharges and officer dismissals are by sentence of a GCM.
Note
:  The evidence, including that bearing on the facts and circumstances of discharge,
must
show that the service member was sentenced by GCM, not a
summary
court-martial or a
special
court-martial.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section A  - Character of Discharge (COD) and Bars to Benefits
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section A
